headlines.description: Peru missed a penalty in a 1-0 loss to Argentina in Buenos Aires on Thursday, delivering another blow to their hopes of World Cup qualification.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lautaro strikes as Argentina narrowly beat Peru

headlines.description: Raphinha turned in another eye-catching performance for Brazil on Thursday by scoring twice in the home side's 4-1 victory over Uruguay.
headlines.shortLinkText: Brazil thrash Uruguay on back of Raphinha brace
